fields.name: Effect:
fields.value: Pick 1 player and another player. The next time the first player plays a card that targets someone else, they will instead target the second player.

fields.name: Upgraded:
fields.value:
Pick 1 player and another player. The next 3 times the first player plays a card that targets someone else, they will instead target the second player. 
 
*This will cause the initial target to bypass a room restriction. Active until activated.*
